price: "Kuma nasĩhãta bã zã ta amfãne ku ba, idan nã yi nufin in yi muku nasĩha, idan Allah Yakasance Yanã nufin Ya halaka ku. Shĩ ne Ubangijinku, kuma zuwa gare Shi ake mayar da ku."
arabic: وَلَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ نُصۡحِيٓ إِنۡ أَرَدتُّ أَنۡ أَنصَحَ لَكُمۡ إِن كَانَ ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يُغۡوِيَكُمۡۚ هُوَ رَبُّكُمۡ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yanfaʿukum nuṣ'ḥī in aradttu an anṣaḥa lakum in kāna al-lahu yurīdu an yugh'wiyakum huwa rabbukum wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
